name: CAPE RNA
short_description: CAPE RNA is package of command-line tools for integrated analysis of miRNA-mRNA expression data. miRNA-mRNA interaction states are assigned for each sample independent of a priori known experimental groups. Using these interaction classifications Jaccard-indexes are calculated to evaluate the quality of a predicted interaction based on the distribution of assigned interaction states compared to experimental groups. In addition, negative correlation between miRNA and mRNA expression can be analyzed.
summary: Classification based Analysis of Paired Expression data of RNA
